doc:
Black Thought https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_Thought 0 Tariq Luqmaan Trotter (born October 3, 1971), better known as Black Thought, is an American rapper and the lead MC of the Philadelphia-based hip hop group, The Roots, as well as an occasional actor. Black Thought, who co-founded The Roots with drummer Questlove (Ahmir Thompson), is widely lauded for his live performance skills, continuous multisyllabic rhyme schemes, complex lyricism, double entendres, and politically aware lyrics. Tariq_Luqmaan_Trotter ( born October_3_,_1971 ) , better_known as Black_Thought , is an_American_rapper and the_lead MC of the_Philadelphia-based_hip_hop_group , The_Roots , as_well_as an_occasional_actor . Black_Thought , who co-founded The_Roots with drummer_Questlove_(_Ahmir_Thompson_) , is_widely_lauded for his_live_performance_skills , continuous_multisyllabic_rhyme_schemes , complex_lyricism , double_entendres , and politically_aware_lyrics .
